评论概述: Stylish and Flattering Crop Top - Perfect for Going Out or Casual Wear
评论详情: The ANRABESS Women’s Long Sleeve Crop Top is a fantastic addition to my wardrobe! The fitted design is flattering, hugging in all the right places, and the crewneck adds a touch of classic style that pairs well with high-waisted jeans or skirts. The material feels soft and has just the right amount of stretch, making it comfortable to wear all day or night. I love how versatile it is – perfect for a night out but also easy to dress down for a casual look. The top holds up well after washing, retaining its shape and softness. If you're looking for a chic, fitted crop top, this one is a great choice!

评论概述: Great find.. perfect shirt for under a blazer or to wear with jeans
评论详情: Great material, soft and flexible.  Great shirt to wear under a blazer.

It’s thin and has incredible drape. Before I put it on the material feels cool, almost wet, but it’s pure comfort once it’s on. The hems are rolled which looks chic and military or utilitarian with the olive drab color I picked. It’s very thin and shows my bra and skin texture but the material is fully opaque in this color. It has some light stretch but the fabric has body, it’s not just cheap spandex. The shoulders and sleeves are fitted and well articulated. The material stretched to accommodate my bust without being baggy at the waist. I look forward to trying other colors.

评论概述: Cute and Stretchy but Slightly Shiny Fabric
评论详情: This ANRABESS Women’s Long Sleeve Shirt is honestly really cute, with a nice, stretchy fit that’s super comfortable. My only issue is that the fabric has a bit of an unusual shine to it, which gives it a slightly cheap look in my opinion. It’s strange because it doesn’t show the shine until you’re wearing it in certain light. Still, it’s a great top overall, and the fit and style make up for the minor fabric issue. Worth it if you don’t mind a bit of sheen!

评论概述: “Good Enough” Option When Your Top Isn’t the Point
评论详情: These tops are flimsy and easily wrinkled, and generally look as inexpensive as they are. No matter what size I get, you can see the outline of my bra through it because the material is thin despite not being sheer.  I buy these when I need a top to layer under something, like a strappy dress, or when I need a top in a specific color for a one-off outfit. As an example, I wanted a forest green tee to wear under an Anthropologie pinafore. The color isn’t very common, and most of the top is covered by the dress, so this worked. I would not get these as a staple.  If you want a bodycon, Y2K fit then order your normal clothing size. If you want a relaxed fit, I would size up.

I wear this under my scrubs and it works great. In usually very warm natured but I get cold in the hospital. It keeps me warm without getting overheated. The fabric is nice and stretchy too. I got a white one and it’s definitely see through, so I couldn’t wear it on its own.
